description: This story humorously illustrates a programmer's aversion to nature due to the presence of bugs, both literal and metaphorical.
title: Nature's Bugs
n_1: Sam enters a beautiful forest, looking for a peaceful spot to work.
n_2: As Sam begins to work, he encounters an unexpected annoyance.
n_3: The bugs become more bothersome, much to Nature's amusement.
n_4: Eventually, Sam finds a way to enjoy nature, bugs and all.
c1_1: What a perfect place to code!
c1_3: I can't work with all these bugs!
c1_4: Okay, I'll admit, nature isn't so bad.
c2_4: See, it's not just about the bugs!
